intro: Software engineer & friction slayer for the #DWeb, easing adoption with @IPFSbot and @GatsbyJS. I use @Brave & value #privacy. https://agentofuser.com

post.body: hm, so replies aren't first-class posts like on twitter. i miss permalinks and likes on them.
testing if markdown. [is this a link to brave dot com?](https://brave.com). are clearnet links automatically annotated as such, or do i have to add a warning every time?

comment.body: @Pexo: nice to meet you :) would you have recommendations of friendly accounts to follow? thank you!
yeah i guess i have to annotate clearnet links myself.
@caryoscelus: good point. i'll look for an extension that can help with this in a way that can be toggled per domain/url pattern.

@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: problem for me is that i don't use the mouse all that much, and vimium doesn't show the url you're going to click, so i have to type `yf` to copy it, look at the clipboard, then decide if i want to type `f` to click it.
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: oh cool! i still got a "content publish failed" error though, weird.
